1.18.2.0.6.6: Added E3 Sentry, Wooden Plane, Axcel SAM Truck, and some qol keybinds. Aircraft, weapon, and radar presets can now be fully customized with datapacks!
1.18.2.0.6.8: Fixed crafting benches not assembling items.
1.18.2.0.6.10: Added Weapons and Aircraft Villager professions, and Radio Part.

1.19.0.3.0: Added a Tank and a small anti-air missile defense unit.
1.19.0.5.6: Added a boat, submarine, some new weapons and radars. Changes to physics system, controls, and pilot overlay.

1.19.0.6.8: Fixed crafting benches not assembling items.
1.19.0.6.10: Added Weapons and Aircraft Villager professions, and Radio Part.

1.19.2.0.3.0: Added a Tank and a small anti-air missile defense unit.
1.19.2.0.5.3: HOTFIX. Previous version is unusable because I made a dumb Java Reflection mistake.
1.19.2.0.5.6: Left shift has been freed! Pilot overlay changes.
1.19.2.0.6.4: ALPHA BUILD! BACKUP YOUR WORLD! Engine system was changed. Old Vehicles may need new engines. Preset system is now fully compatible with datapacks! Create your own aircraft and weapon presets!
1.19.2.0.6.6: Added E3 Sentry, Wooden Plane, Axcel SAM Truck, and some qol keybinds. Aircraft, weapon, and radar presets can now be fully customized with datapacks!
1.19.2.0.6.7: Bug fixes and nerfed the radar air to air missiles.
1.19.2.0.6.8: Fixed crafting benches not assembling items.
1.19.2.0.6.9: Added Weapons and Aircraft Villager professions.
1.19.2.0.7.0: Updated Vehicle Overlay. Vehicle inventory ui is fully customizable via resourcepack! Plane AOA is more stable.
1.19.2.0.7.2: New WIP models, lots of bug fixes, more stuff in config!
1.19.2.0.7.6: New Common and Client config stuff. Added Bunker Buster. Funny music discs. Elephant load of bug fixes.
1.19.2.0.9.0: New and improved plane models, mob turret AI, better particles, vehicle spraycan, and can now walk on boats!
1.19.2.0.9.1: Added Gimbal Camera! Press ';' by default.
1.19.2.0.9.3: Added Eden Plane, Google Sub, and Storage Boxes!
1.19.2.0.9.4: Actual missile models render under the racks.
1.19.2.0.10.0: BACKUP YOUR WORLDS. Everything is data driven, improved hitboxes, and improved fighter jet physics!
1.19.2.0.11.0: onewholibs is now a required dependency! Added Krait Chopper and James Wooden Plane.
